{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = RT-AX53U 01.png |image1_size = 150px |caption = AX1800 Dual Band WiFi 6 Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.asus.com/Networking-IoT-Servers/WiFi-Routers/ASUS-WiFi-Routers/RT-AX53U/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = ASUS_RT-AX53U |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = Supported |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = RT-AX53 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = U |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 10/15/2021 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/ASUS_RT-AX53U |wlclass = AX1800 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-RTAX8E00 |icid = 3568A-RTAX8E00 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7621AT; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 1004Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 880 <!-- 880 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 16-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX30LF1G18AC-TI; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5CC128M16ER-EK; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, WPA3, 1024QAM, MU-MIMO, OFDMA, VHT80, HEW80, AiProtection |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SGE |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt,
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 09/08/2021 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7905DAN; |rad1chip2 = MediaTek;MT7975DN; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad1ax = 574 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7905DAN; |rad2chip2 = MediaTek;MT7975DN; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 1201 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 867 |rad2n = 300 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{seealso|ASUS}}
===Specifications=== *[[ASUS RT-AX53U]] + 1x WAN/3x LAN + USB port (07/2021) √ :WiFi 6, AX1800, 2.4GHz AX: 2x2 + 5GHz AX: 2x2 :ASUS features: Parental control, AiProtection, 3/4G Dongle *[[ASUS RT-AX1800U]] + 1x WAN/3x LAN + USB port √ :WiFi 6, AX1800, 2.4GHz AX: 2x2 + 5GHz AX: 2x2 :ASUS features: Parental control, AiProtection, 3/4G Dongle *[[ASUS RT-AX1800S]] + 1x WAN/4x LAN - USB port ± :WiFi 6, AX1800, 2.4GHz AX: 2x2 + 5GHz AX: 2x2 :ASUS features: Parental control, AiProtection
==Links of Interest== [https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/asus/asus_rt-ax53u On the '''OpenWrt''' Wiki]
